text: 3.3: Mt 24.43-44; Ru 12.39-40; 1 Te 5.2; 5.6; 1 T 6.20; 2 Pi 3.10; VB 2.5; 16.15Nde mba fhum mbararagiap ndigi buna vhuueŋ, nde taagi ne ndɨkndɨgɨri. Nde tuituigip ana zɨn ŋgɨp, wom ndav dorgɨri. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip ŋkuu thav khavgirga fhu, gu kɨɨi guma zi farar muuŋgip, gu vhemkora nden hɨgɨrga. Nde gu zɨrga tuk, nde ana kaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
